It's essentially doing things with magic that are otherwise impossible, and have no real standing in science.

Can you tell me more about your past? I don't know much about where you used to live.
Sure thing. I come from a village far to the east. I was travelling and performing all across the country on my way to Arcadia, where I wanted to settle.
It was genius in retrospect; I'd perform my shows and live off the road using the money.
Performing in new places is always lucrative, even these days sometimes I travel outside of Arcadia to perform. I'll be back in the evenings though, so no need to worry.
Before that I was at school, I'm only just nineteen I'll have you know.
I lived in Sylvania and grew up with a single mother. There was no father, I was born through magic, so I guess that means I'm a clone of my mom.
Life in the village was surprisingly similar to the Arcadian suburbs; I however, was different!
Oh sheesh, I was a spoilt child, it brings a tear to my eye.
Alright, your turn now, I want to know about you.
Fair enough, we haven't talked about that since the day after I arrived.
We spend a while talking about my past life, my friends, family and everyday life.
How's life in Arcadia treating you?
I loooove it! I hope you do too.
I'm still really sorry about what happened.
It's fine, I'm over that stuff now. I've come to terms with the fact you somehow cloned me.
Ehehe... Sorry, sorry!
Haha, come on, answer my question from before.
Ohh right! I've made tons of friends here, almost all thanks to Penelope.
We used to go to the bar together in the evening, and that's where I got very close to Prisma.
Being friends with the person that runs the largest bar in the suburbs is handy, because she knows a lot about Arcadia and its people.
Before I knew it, I had a gang of friends including all those that you're working for.
I hope they're treating you just as kindly as they treated me.
Definitely, if it wasn't for the kindness of everyone here, I don't think I could have adapted to this new life as easily.
Phew, thank Aurora for that.
We spend some time gossiping, I guess I've picked up that habit from spending so much time around girls.
